name: Ghost Slimed AR
description:
Ghost Slimed is the rhythm as your head glides....

Escape the AR ghosts or get slimed in this frenetic action game by debut XR game developer, Beatrice. 

Use your mouse to move the camera in order to avoid ghosts if ghosts hit you, you will get slimed. But, worries no more, click on the slimed 5 times to reset the game.
